mainText:
My condolences to Mr Steve Jobs family and friends..
Yet, how lucky we are to have witnessed his great mind a man who kept going till the end... To learn about great men in history books is one thing, we were very fortunate to have experienced it! Thank you for sharing your dreams come true with all of us.
Rest in peace under a beautiful Apple tree....

Sincerely,  (who cant live with out iPhone and iPod)
author: Leslie
